#### Dotfiles

This is a repository for most of my dotfiles, which in combination with a package list, can generate an os-like experience.

#### Base Packages

##### ARCH
```
fd
fzf
git
htop
ripgrep
the_silver_searcher
tmux
xcape
xclip
xorg-setxkbmap
zsh
zsh-syntax-highlighting
```

##### AUR
```
neovim-git
lf-git
```
